subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Frans Nielsen’s first N.H.L. goal turned out to be the winner and the Islanders defeated the Montreal Canadiens, 3-2, on Saturday. Jeff Tambellini and Jason Blake also scored for the Islanders.
snippet: Frans Nielsen’s first N.H.L. goal turned out to be the winner and the Islanders defeated the Montreal Canadiens, 3-2, on Saturday. Jeff Tambellini and Jason Blake also scored for the Islanders.
